entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
